snoozeLimitMessage: For your health, please do not skip this reminder.

rule202020.title: 20-20-20 Rule
rule202020.message: Time to rest your eyes! Look at an object 20 feet (6m) away for 20 seconds.

postureCheck.title: Posture Check
postureCheck.message: Sit up straight, keep your wrists neutral, and avoid leaning too close to the screen.

hydration.title: Time to Drink Water
hydration.message: A glass of water helps you stay refreshed.

longBreak.title: You've Earned a Break
longBreak.message: You've been doing great on this project for {hours} hours! Take at least 15 minutes to refresh your mind.

creativeBoost.title: Creativity Boost!
creativeBoost.message: Since your last break, you've completed {blocks} blocks! Ignite your creativity with a quick Challenge: {prompt}
